trans-unit.source: Represents a row within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料列內<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewRow class is used to represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewRow 類別用於表示中的個別資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has a designated row type.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項具有指定之資料列型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the row types that are valid for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出適用於資料列型別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: |資料列型別 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|空的資料列中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| To determine the row type of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 沒有要顯示的記錄時，將會顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的空白資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的頁尾資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的標頭資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的頁面巡覽區資料列。 | 若要判斷 DetailsViewRow 物件的資料列類型，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewRow 物件也會有與它相關聯的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 狀態可以是下表中的值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in edit mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in insert mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| To determine the state of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |狀態值 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|DetailsViewRow 物件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的替代資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|DetailsViewRow 物件處於編輯模式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|DetailsViewRow 物件處於插入模式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|DetailsViewRow 物件處於其標準 （預設值）。 | 若要判斷 DetailsViewRow 物件的狀態，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control stores all its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制儲存在其所有的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a DetailsViewRow object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷 DetailsViewRow 物件中的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the DetailsViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用來存取個別 DetailsViewRow 物件的儲存格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格包含控制項，您可以使用從儲存格擷取控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>儲存格的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法來尋找控制項，如果控制項的儲存格的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>欄位資料行或自動產生的欄位資料行，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>資料格的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的欄位值從其他位置的欄位值繫結至控制項的欄位資料行類型，先擷取控制項從適當的資料格，然後存取控制項的適當的屬性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 便可使用資料繫結運算式中直接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>沒有繫結至控制項的屬性的值的欄位資料行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，將欄位值會自動放入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的欄位值，您必須先擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控制項從適當的資料格，然後使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewRow class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 DetailsViewRow 類別的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|The value specified by the `itemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value specified by the `rowType` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value specified by the `rowState` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|所指定的值`itemIndex`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>|所指定的值`rowType`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>|所指定的值`rowState`參數。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料列的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要在事件頁面的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已取消。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: RowIndex 屬性用於判斷索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料列。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowState property to determine the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RowState 屬性來判斷資料列的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 狀態可以是下表中的值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in insert mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: |狀態值 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的替代資料列。 | |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件處於編輯模式。 | |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件處於插入模式。 | |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件處於其標準 （預設值）。 | 這個屬性通常用來判斷執行作業之前的資料列的狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料列型別<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料列型別屬性，來判斷類型的資料列，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件表示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid row type values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出有效的資料列型別值。

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: |資料列型別 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的資料列。 | |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|空的資料列中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: 沒有要顯示的記錄時，將會顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的空白資料列。 | |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的頁尾資料列。 | |`DataControlRowType.Header`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的標頭資料列。 | |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的頁面巡覽區資料列。 | 這個屬性通常用來判斷執行作業之前的資料列的類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>值。
